title: Looking for new to laners!
body:
In a nut shell, I'm trying to learn mid lane...done lots of research and watched many videos however I'm lacking confidence and anxiety is getting the best of me.

Looking for those new to top lane, support, and ADC. 

Please be accepting of any or all of the above losing lane/unintentionally feeding or just outright losing the game as we all learn to play.

replies.body:
Hi!

I'm a Gold V ADC, looking to learn top and jungle. 
I just started last season so I'm quite new the whole league scene. If that's acceptable to you, may I join you in learning new positions? 
I'm online most of the nights, but some days might not on league unless friends are playing. 

IGN: Hachihachi

> [{quoted}](name=HachiHachi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RG7QYXvY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-23T07:54:36.620+0000)
>
> Hi!
> 
> I'm a Gold V ADC, looking to learn top and jungle. 
> I just started last season so I'm quite new the whole league scene. If that's acceptable to you, may I join you in learning new positions? 
> I'm online most of the nights, but some days might not on league unless friends are playing. 
> 
> IGN: Hachihachi

Sounds perfect! I've sent you a FR.
